Room.Name: Brownhaven West Gate
Room.ShortDescription: You stand just outside the Brownhaven village gate on a colorful brick road.
Room.LongDescription: The village has grown so much in recent years that it probably should be referred to as a town or even a small city, but the residents like to think of their home as a friendly little village. The great walls around it have served the village well in keeping out invaders, but they have also added to rumors concerning what may be untold wealth hidden inside.
